text:
Hey!
I should create several blogs ('blog', 'tutorials', etc...). Also, I need to have a page where all this blog articles will put together with one title "all posts" (<https://prnt.sc/erpAxdUPahzh>)
Is it possible to get all articles together? and could it be done by portions (paginated I mean, by 10 or smth)

Howdy everyone. I must be missing something. From this page <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/cms/building-blocks/modules/export-to-template-context#user-selectable-background-images> under “User selectable background images” - I copy the code exactly from the example into my dnd template. The sample default image appears. But if select an image in my landing page, it never changes and continues to show the default image.
